codeSystems.name: CancerStageVS
codeSystems.title: Cancer Stage Group Value Set
codeSystems.description: The result of cancer staging, i.e., the stage or category of the cancer.

codeSystems.name: CancerStagingMethodVS
codeSystems.title: Cancer Staging Method Value Set
codeSystems.description: System or method used for staging cancers. The terms in this value set describe staging systems, not specific stages or descriptors used within those systems.

codeSystems.name: CancerStagingTypeVS
codeSystems.title: Cancer Staging Type Value Set
codeSystems.description: Identifying codes for the type of cancer staging performed. In terms of the SNOMED CT hierarchy, these codes represent observables.

codeSystems.name: TNMDistantMetastasesCategoryMaxVS
codeSystems.title: TNM Distant Metastases Maximum Value Set
codeSystems.description: Values for TNM distant metastases category must be selected from this value set, which includes all codes from UICC and all codes from TNMDistantMetastasesCategoryVS.

codeSystems.name: TNMDistantMetastasesCategoryVS
codeSystems.title: TNM Distant Metastases Category Value Set
codeSystems.description: Result values for M category. This value set contains SNOMED-CT equivalents of UICC codes for the M category, according to TNM staging rules.

codeSystems.name: TNMDistantMetastasesStagingTypeVS
codeSystems.title: TNM Distant Metastases Staging Type Value Set
codeSystems.description: Identifying codes for the type of cancer staging performed, i.e., clinical, pathological, or other, for distant metastases (M) staging observation.

codeSystems.name: TNMPrimaryTumorCategoryMaxVS
codeSystems.title: TNM Primary Tumor Maximum Value Set
codeSystems.description: Values for TNM primary tumor category must be selected from this value set, which includes all codes from UICC and all codes from TNMPrimaryTumorCategoryVS.

codeSystems.name: TNMPrimaryTumorCategoryVS
codeSystems.title: TNM Primary Tumor Category Value Set
codeSystems.description: Result values for T category. This value set contains SNOMED-CT equivalents of UICC codes for the T category, according to TNM staging rules.

codeSystems.name: TNMPrimaryTumorStagingTypeVS
codeSystems.title: TNM Primary Tumor Staging Type Value Set
codeSystems.description: Identifying codes for the type of cancer staging performed, i.e., clinical, pathological, or other, for primary tumor (T) staging observation.

codeSystems.name: TNMRegionalNodesCategoryMaxVS
codeSystems.title: TNM Regional Nodes Maximum Value Set
codeSystems.description: Values for TNM regional nodes category must be selected from this value set, which includes all codes from UICC and all codes from TNMRegionalNodesCategoryVS.

codeSystems.name: TNMRegionalNodesCategoryVS
codeSystems.title: TNM Regional Nodes Category Value Set
codeSystems.description: Result values for N category. This value set contains SNOMED-CT equivalents of UICC codes for the N category, according to TNM staging rules.

codeSystems.name: TNMRegionalNodesStagingTypeVS
codeSystems.title: TNM Regional Nodes Staging Type Value Set
codeSystems.description: Identifying codes for the type of cancer staging performed, i.e., clinical, pathological, or other, for regional nodes (N) staging observation.

codeSystems.name: TNMStageGroupMaxVS
codeSystems.title: TNM Stage Group Maximum Value Set
codeSystems.description: Values for TNM stage group must be selected from this value set, which includes all codes from UICC and all codes from TNMStageGroupVS.

codeSystems.name: TNMStageGroupStagingTypeVS
codeSystems.title: TNM Stage Group Staging Type Value Set
codeSystems.description: Identifying codes for the type of cancer staging performed, i.e., clinical, pathological, or other, for the stage group observation.

codeSystems.name: TNMStageGroupVS
codeSystems.title: TNM Stage Group Value Set
codeSystems.description: Result values for cancer stage group using TNM staging. This value set contains SNOMED-CT equivalents of UICC codes for Stage Group, according to TNM staging rules.

codeSystems.name: TNMStagingMethodVS
codeSystems.title: TNM Staging Method Value Set
codeSystems.description: Method used for TNM staging, e.g., UICC 6th, 7th, or 8th edition.

codeSystems.name: VeneninvasionVS
codeSystems.title: Veneninvasion ValueSet
codeSystems.description: VeneninvasionVS

codeSystems.name: ECOGPerformanceStatusVS
codeSystems.title: ECOG
codeSystems.description: ECOG Performance Status (Level 0-5).
